mapper.select: WITH OrderDetails AS ( SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_STATUS, (SELECT CLIENT_NAME FROM CLIENT C WHERE C.CLIENT_ID = ORDR.CUSTOMER_ID) AS CUSTOMER_ID, (SELECT MATERIAL_NAME FROM MATERIAL M2 WHERE M2.MATERIAL_ID = ORDR.ITEM_ID) AS ITEM_ID, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, (SELECT MATERIAL_PRICE FROM MATERIAL M1 WHERE M1.MATERIAL_ID = ORDR.ITEM_ID) AS MATERIAL_PRICE, ORDER_QTY, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DELIVERY_DATE, ITEM_ID AS UNIT, ITEM_ID AS STANDARD, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER M1 WHERE M1.MEMBER_ID = ORDR.SALES_REP_ID) AS SALES_REP_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER M1 WHERE M1.MEMBER_ID = ORDR.REGIST_BY) AS REGIST_BY, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM ORDERS ORDR ) SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_STATUS, CUSTOMER_ID, ITEM_ID, ORDER_DATE, MATERIAL_PRICE * ORDER_QTY AS ORDER_PR, -- 공급가 * 수량 (MATERIAL_PRICE * ORDER_QTY) * 0.1 AS TAX, -- 부가세(10%) (MATERIAL_PRICE * ORDER_QTY) + ((MATERIAL_PRICE * ORDER_QTY) * 0.1) AS ORDER_SUM, -- 공급가 + 부가세(합계금액) DELIVERY_DATE, UNIT, STANDARD, SALES_REP_ID, ORDER_QTY, ORDER_QTY AS SHIPPED_QTY, ORDER_QTY AS BACKLOG, REGIST_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, CREATE_DATE FROM OrderDetails ORDER BY ORDER_ID DESC
